data.text: @CBCOttawa Well it ainâ€™t over and we still need the booster.  I am tired of restrictions as much as the next person.  But the sorry uptake of the booster will just prolong this.  So get out there and get your 3rd shot.
@CBCOttawa Did it ever cross your mind that some people had serious adverse events after taking the 2nd Covid vaccine, this might be why people are not lining up to take the booster!

@CBCOttawa This is biased nonsense. How about looking at the Pfizer data, whose release the FDA and Pfizer itself attempted to block for 75 years. How about looking at deaths and adverse events. Talking to actual immunologists, virologists, and vaccine injured! Shame on you.
@CBCOttawa Millions got COVID since December and NACI says to wait 3 months to get a booster after infection, so there are a bunch of people right there.
@rhonnygyrl @CBCOttawa Yet, Africa has less covid deaths then us...
@CBCOttawa Or maybe the documents that just dropped.

@CBCOttawa Or maybe some of us can't justify boostering perfectly healthy people when the developing world doesn't even have enough vaccine for 1st doses. When only 6% of the continent of Africa has rec'd 1 dose. Can't boost your way out of a PANdemic.
